titleStmt.title: Granados spirituall and heauenlie exercises Deuided into seauen pithie and briefe meditations, for euery day in the vveeke one. Written in Spanish, by the learned and reuerend diuine, F. Lewes of Granado. Since translated into the Latine, Italian French, and the Germaine tongue. And now englished by Francis Meres, Maister of Artes of both Vniuersities, and student in Diuinitie.
Meditaciones para todos los días de la semana. English
titleStmt.author: Luis, de Granada, 1504-1588.

titleStmt.title: Granados spirituall and heauenlie exercises Deuided into seauen pithie and briefe meditations, for euery day in the vveeke one. Written in Spanish, by the learned and reuerend diuine, F. Lewes of Granado. Since translated into the Latine, Italian French, and the Germaine tongue. And now englished by Francis Meres, Maister of Artes of both Vniuersities, and student in Diuinitie.
Meditaciones para todos los días de la semana. English
titleStmt.author: Luis, de Granada, 1504-1588.
Meres, Francis, 1565-1647.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iames Robarts, for I. B[ing],

notesStmt.note: A translation, by Francis Meres, of: Luis, de Granada. Meditaciones para todos los días de la semana.
Includes "An exposition vpon the one and fifty Psalme", which has a separately dated title page and separate pagination; register is continuous.
Pages 244-247 are bound between leaves A3 and A4 of the dedication.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
